synopsis.text: Earth's defenders, the Crane Game Girls, are back in action! After saving the planet from meteors and becoming the most sought-after idol group, they face a new threat from the depths of space. Dark Gorilla, an enemy from their past, is poised to attack Earth once more. To combat this menace, the girls are equipped with a new crane game, "Galaxy." But as they prepare for battle, their monitors reveal unexpected foes: three idols, eerily similar to themselves. As they grapple with the ethics of fighting their own kind, they must also unravel the mystery of their former manager's disappearance and her sudden reappearance as the manager of their new rivals, Dark Cherry. Will the Crane Game Girls be able to protect Earth and uncover the truth behind these strange occurrences? Join them as they navigate the challenges of stardom, friendship, and interstellar warfare in this thrilling anime adventure.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
